concept.title: len
concept.shortdesc: Description of the len supplementary matcher.

conbody.p: The len supplementary matcher queries the length of a phone. It accepts a float as a single parameter. The matcher will match if the phone has the specified length. For more information about how phone length is specified, see the description of .

example.p: Search for a phone that has a single, long diacritic..:len("1.0")
